titles.title: Encouraging nonprofit organizations to increase the number of women and minorities on their governing boards and encouraging Americans to enrich their lives and serve their communities by volunteering to serve on the governing boards of nonprofit organizations.

Encouraging nonprofit organizations to increase the number of women and minorities on their governing boards and encouraging Americans to enrich their lives and serve their communities by volunteering to serve on the governing boards of nonprofit organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Criminal Justice, Drug Policy and Human Resources.

committee.name: House Oversight and Accountability
committee.subcommittee: Criminal Justice, Drug Policy and Human Resources

bill.summary: Encourages nonprofit organizations to increase the number of women and minorities on their governing boards. Encourages Americans to enrich their lives and serve their communities by volunteering to serve on the governing boards of such organizations.
